page.title: 06Childrens Games
page.content:
Jacks is played by girls and a few boys too.It is played with a small rubber ball and some small metal objects like stars.You have to bounce the ball and pick up a star with one hand and catch the ball before it bounces again.If it bounces more than once the next person has a go.
French elastic is usually played by girls,2 girls put a long loop of elastic round their legs the rest choose a leader.The leader has to jump in and do a straddle jump or cross their legs and twist the elastic and jump out again.Then everybody else has to follow one at a time.
